references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973, p. 124, table 5.1.2, p*a_p
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: Sum a(n) x^n / n = log (1 + Sum d(n) x^n ), where d(n) is # digraphs on n nodes (A000273 ).
mathematica: Needs["Combinatorica`"]; d[n_] := GraphPolynomial[n, x, Directed] /. x -> 1; max = 12; se = Series[ Sum[ a[n]*x^n/n, {n, 1, max}] - Log[1 + Sum[ d[n]*x^n, {n, 1, max}]], {x, 0, max}]; sol = SolveAlways[ se == 0, x]; A003084 = Table[ a[n], {n, 1, max}] /. sol[[1]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 01 2012, after formula *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 09 2000
